mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, nickname, profile_image, gender, age_range) VALUES (#{email}, #{nickname}, #{profileImage}, #{gender}, #{ageRange})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET nickname = #{nickname}, profile_image = #{profileImage}, gender = #{gender}, age_range = #{ageRange}, last_nickname_change_date = CASE WHEN #{nickname} != (SELECT nickname FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId}) THEN NOW() ELSE last_nickname_change_date END WHERE user_id = #{userId}
